kDesc

This bundle has everything you need to spell out your name or create a message for your friends in a gorgeous font style. This bundle includes the following ornaments: 


* Name In Lights: Jumbo 'A' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'B' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'C' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'D' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'E' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'F' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'G' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'H' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'I' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'J' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'K' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'L' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'M' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'N' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'O' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'P' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'Q' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'R' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'S' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'T' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights :Jumbo 'U' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'V' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'W' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'X' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'Y' (Glow) 
 * Name In Lights: Jumbo 'Z' (Glow) 
 

※ Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. [#Legal]

Ce lot est parfait pour écrire votre nom ou créer un message pour vos amis dans une police superbe. Ce lot comporte les objets suivants : 


* Nom illuminé : "A" Maxi (Lueur) 
 * Nom illuminé : "B" Maxi (Lueur)
